eligibility: Only students qualifying minimum eligibility criteria for the respective UG, PG, M.Phil, or PhD course at Delhi University are eligible to apply. Detailed eligibility varies by course and is specified in the official notification.[1][2]

faqs.question: Is DUET still conducted for Delhi University admissions?
faqs.answer: As of recent notifications, DUET has been replaced by the CUET (Common University Entrance Test) for most Delhi University admissions. Please refer to the latest DU notifications for current admission procedures.[1]
